Title: Requires sentences for violent felonies committed after arraignment but prior to the imposition of sentence for a felony to run consecutive to the sentence for the original felony
Summary: Requires sentences for violent felonies committed after arraignment but prior to the imposition of sentence for a felony to run consecutive to the sentence for the original felony.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to requiring sentences for violent felonies committed after arraignment but prior to the imposition of sentence on a pending felony charge to run consecutive to the sentence for the original felony
